question: So I am 29 weeks and 3 days pregnant with my first child and I have recently been told by my doctor that not only do I have gestational diabetes but I am also anemic, and I have recently been having very sharp pain in my lower back that doesn't let me sleep and I wake up every 15 minutes at night to pee and nothing ever comes out yet it burns when I try to pee and constipation is also another big issue right now any Ideas or recommendations that would bw helpful?
title: Lower back pains!
